statements: SELECT * FROM EquipmentFailurePrediction ORDER BY equipment_id ASC
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_log FROM EquipmentFailurePrediction WHERE failure_prediction = TRUE
SELECT * FROM EquipmentFailurePrediction WHERE equipment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_log FROM EquipmentFailurePrediction ORDER BY maintenance_log DESC
SELECT equipment_id, failure_prediction FROM EquipmentFailurePrediction WHERE maintenance_log IS NOT NULL
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_log FROM EquipmentFailurePrediction WHERE failure_prediction = true
SELECT * FROM EquipmentFailurePrediction WHERE equipment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT failure_prediction, equipment_id FROM EquipmentFailurePrediction WHERE maintenance_log LIKE '%repair%'
SELECT DISTINCT maintenance_log FROM EquipmentFailurePrediction WHERE failure_prediction = false ORDER BY equipment_id DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_failures FROM EquipmentFailurePrediction WHERE failure_prediction = true
SELECT * FROM equipment_logs;
SELECT equipment_id, log_date FROM equipment_logs WHERE predicted_failure = true;
SELECT log_id, equipment_id, log_date FROM equipment_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM equipment_logs WHERE equipment_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM equipment_logs WHERE predicted_failure = TRUE ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(*) AS logs_count FROM equipment_logs GROUP BY equipment_id;
SELECT equipment_id, AVG(maintenance_cost) AS avg_maintenance_cost FROM maintenance_schedule GROUP BY equipment_id HAVING AVG(maintenance_cost) > 100;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type LIKE 'Preventive%' ORDER BY maintenance_date;
SELECT equipment_id, MAX(maintenance_cost) AS max_maintenance_cost FROM maintenance_schedule GROUP BY equipment_id ORDER BY max_maintenance_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM Equipment ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT log_id, maintenance_description FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM Equipment JOIN MaintenanceLogs ON Equipment.equipment_id = MaintenanceLogs.equipment_id WHERE equipment_name LIKE '%Machine%';
SELECT prediction_id, predicted_failure_date, predicted_failure_reason FROM FailurePrediction ORDER BY predicted_failure_date;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM Equipment;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;

SELECT Equipment.equipment_name, MaintenanceLogs.maintenance_date, FailurePrediction.predicted_failure_reason FROM Equipment JOIN MaintenanceLogs ON Equipment.equipment_id = MaintenanceLogs.equipment_id JOIN FailurePrediction ON MaintenanceLogs.log_id = FailurePrediction.log_id WHERE MaintenanceLogs.maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_name LIKE '%machine%';
SELECT * FROM FailurePrediction WHERE predicted_failure_date = (SELECT MAX(predicted_failure_date) FROM FailurePrediction);
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT id, model FROM equipment WHERE id = 1;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, technician_name FROM maintenance_logs WHERE technician_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM failure_predictions ORDER BY prediction_date DESC;
SELECT technician_name, technician_email FROM technicians;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT serial_number, model FROM equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT e.id, e.model, m.maintenance_date, m.technician_name FROM equipment e JOIN maintenance_logs m ON e.id = m.equipment_id;
SELECT e.model, f.prediction_date, f.predicted_failure_reason FROM equipment e JOIN failure_predictions f ON e.id = f.equipment_id WHERE f.prediction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT t.technician_name, t.technician_email, COUNT(m.maintenance_description) AS maintenance_count FROM technicians t LEFT JOIN maintenance_logs m ON t.technician_name = m.technician_name GROUP BY t.technician_name, t.technician_email ORDER BY maintenance_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT name, serial_number FROM equipment WHERE id = 1;
SELECT equipment.id, maintenance_log.maintenance_date, maintenance_log.comments FROM equipment JOIN maintenance_log ON equipment.id = maintenance_log.equipment_id;
SELECT DISTINCT maintenance_type.type_name FROM maintenance_type;

SELECT equipment.name, technicians.name AS technician_name, failure_prediction.predicted_date FROM equipment JOIN technicians ON equipment.id = technicians.technician_id JOIN failure_prediction ON equipment.id = failure_prediction.equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT name, serial_number, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment WHERE id > 5;

SELECT equipment.name, maintenance_log.maintenance_type, technicians.name FROM equipment JOIN maintenance_log ON equipment.id = maintenance_log.equipment_id JOIN technicians ON maintenance_log.technician_id = technicians.technician_id WHERE equipment.name = 'Printer';

SELECT maintenance_log.maintenance_type, maintenance_log.comments, maintenance_log.maintenance_date, technicians.name FROM maintenance_log JOIN technicians ON maintenance_log.technician_id = technicians.technician_id WHERE maintenance_log.maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT equipment.name, maintenance_type.type_name, maintenance_type.description FROM equipment JOIN maintenance_log ON equipment.id = maintenance_log.equipment_id JOIN maintenance_type ON maintenance_log.maintenance_type = maintenance_type.type_name WHERE equipment.name LIKE '%Computer%' ORDER BY maintenance_type.type_name DESC;
